segments.text: Good morning , Kate . Long time no see .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good morning , Vera , Nice to meet you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Kate , I know you ’ Ve been a stewardess for more than one year . And I ’ ll have an interview on stewardess tomorrow . Can you tell me some etiquette about the interview ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course . First you should do up your long hair and do make up but not too thick .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is there anything else I should pay attention to ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , when you attend the interview , you should pay attention to your manner , style of conversation and expression . You should keep smiling always , being polite when you talk with the interviewer . Don't move from time to time when you sit there . And you also should know how to use eye contact .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you , I've learned so much from you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That ’ s all right . Hope you can do better tomorrow .
segments.speaker: S2
